sense.gloss: other people's affairs, someone else's problem

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はまるで↑人↑↓|ひと↓ごと|みたいな↑顔↑↓かお↓をしているね。
sdata.e: You look as if it were none of your business.

sdata.j: その↑候補↑↓こうほ↓↑者↑↓しゃ↓は↑会↑↓あ↓う↑人↑↓|ひと↓ごと|に↑手↑↓て↓を↑振↑↓ふ↓った。
sdata.e: The candidate waved his hand to whomever he saw.
Don't think it has nothing to do with you.

sdata.j: ↑人↑↓|ひと↓ごと|だと↑思↑↓おも↓って。
sdata.e: That's only because you don't have to do it.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑会↑↓あ↓う↑人↑↓|ひと↓ごと|に↑話↑↓はな↓しかけた。
sdata.e: He spoke to whomever he met.
